## HALALStakeChange type

Represents the change between two states of an HALAL Stake.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type HALALStakeChange<T> = {
    stakeHALAL: T;
    unstakeHALAL?: undefined;
} | {
    stakeHALAL?: undefined;
    unstakeHALAL: T;
    unstakeAllHALAL: boolean;
};
```
